creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: abstracted pine tree extending diagonally up the scroll from LL with bristly, pointed, downturned branches and bristles along trunk; red sun in upper center; hints of pale pink clouds in background
inscription: 天半朱霞気　雲中白鶴飛 (The vermilion mist breathes through half the sky; / The white crane flies amid the clouds.) [Stephen Addiss]
title: Pine Tree and Rising Sun
